tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  incident_description TEXT,
  affected_systems INT,
  reporting_user VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   incident_date DATE,
   incident_type VARCHAR(50),
   incident_description TEXT,
   department_id INT);

CREATE TABLE departments (department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   department_name VARCHAR(50),
   department_head VARCHAR(50),
   department_location VARCHAR(100));

CREATE TABLE reports (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   report_date DATE,
   report_details TEXT,
   incident_id INT,
   department_id INT);

CREATE TABLE users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50),
   email VARCHAR(100),
   department_id INT);

CREATE TABLE SecurityIncidents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    reporter VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IncidentDetails (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    detail_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DataQueries (
    query_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    query_text TEXT,
    query_date DATE,
    executed_by VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ReportResults (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    query_id INT,
    result_text TEXT,
    result_date DATE
)
